titles.title: To extend the time period prior to the need for workers for the filing of applications for temporary labor certification in the processing of alien labor certification applications.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/17/2002--Introduced. Allows applications for alien labor certifications for temporary nonagricultural occupations to be filed with appropriate employment agencies up to 180 days before workers are needed.
